scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('@swc/core') } catch (e) { console.warn('Optional dependencies missing, will use JS implementation') }"
scripts.use-babel-plugin: bun remove @vitejs/plugin-react-swc && bun add @vitejs/plugin-react && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const configPath=path.resolve('vite.config.ts');let config=fs.readFileSync(configPath,'utf8');config=config.replace(/react-swc/g,'react');fs.writeFileSync(configPath,config);"
